name: DateABank
body:
# This is the server side code

It's written using [node.js](http://nodejs.org/).

It also uses [mongodb](http://mongodb.org/) for the database.

It's paired with the Titanium Studio iPhone app project, [Transact](http://dogeared.github.com/Transact).

You can read more about the project at my blog, [afitnerd](http://afitnerd.com/2012/03/19/code-small-ftw-monday/).

![DateABAnk](http://afitnerd.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/04/DateABankScreenshot.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
